author: Andrew Griffin, Andrew Griffin
title: 5G-coronavirus conspiracy theory is 'complete rubbish' say scientists as celebrities spread fear
description: Expert says any link would be 'both a physical and biological impossibility'
content:
Scientists have poured scorn on a viral conspiracy theory that suggests there is a link between 5G networks and the Covid-19 outbreak.
In recent days, celebrities and numerous popular posts have suggested the coronavirus outbreak is either being caused or ex… [+7272 chars]
